title: Replace founder profile image with BarnaliFinalSSF.png using v43 cache-busting

requirements.text: Replace the founder profile image (Barnali Chakraborty) in the Core Team section with the uploaded BarnaliFinalSSF.png image, maintaining 400x400 dimensions to match existing team member images
acceptanceCriteria: The CoreTeam component references BarnaliFinalSSF.png as the source image for Barnali Chakraborty's profile
The image maintains 400x400 pixel dimensions consistent with other team member images
The founder's name, role, and description text remain unchanged

requirements.text: Generate a completely unique filename for the founder profile image using v43 versioning convention (e.g., 'barnali-founder-v43.dim_400x400.png') that has never been used before to force all browsers, CDNs, and cache layers to treat it as an entirely new asset

quotes: again and again your are showing random image

acceptanceCriteria: The generated image filename uses v43 versioning (e.g., barnali-founder-v43.dim_400x400.png)
The filename has never been used in any previous version of the application
The filename is distinct from all previous versions (v34-v42)

requirements.text: Implement maximum cache-busting strategy combining: (1) completely unique filename never used before with v43 versioning, (2) timestamp query parameter appended to image URL using Date.now(), (3) unique React key prop on the image element based on current timestamp, (4) cache-control and pragma HTTP headers set to 'no-cache' and 'no-store', and (5) DOM manipulation forcing image reload on component mount

quotes: before publishing result.. check image correctly replace

acceptanceCriteria: The image URL includes a timestamp query parameter (e.g., ?t=1234567890)
The img element has a unique React key prop that changes on every mount
The img element includes cache-control='no-cache' and pragma='no-cache' attributes
A useEffect hook in CoreTeam component manipulates the DOM to force image reload on mount
All five cache-busting mechanisms are active simultaneously

requirements.text: Verify before deployment that the CoreTeam component correctly references the new v43 filename (barnali-founder-v43.dim_400x400.png) and not any previous version filenames

quotes: before publishing result.. check image correctly replace

acceptanceCriteria: The CoreTeam component's image src attribute points to barnali-founder-v43.dim_400x400.png
No references to previous versions (v34-v42) exist in the component code
The image path follows the pattern: /assets/generated/barnali-founder-v43.dim_400x400.png

constraints: Do not modify the CoreTeam component's team member data structure beyond the image reference
Maintain 400x400 pixel dimensions for consistency with other team member profile images
Use the exact filename BarnaliFinalSSF.png as the source for image generation
Preserve all existing cache-busting mechanisms from v42 implementation
nonGoals: Changing the founder's name, role, or description text
Altering the CoreTeam component's layout or styling

edits: Process uploaded BarnaliFinalSSF.png image to 400x400 dimensions (BarnaliFinalSSF.png > barnali-founder-v43.dim_400x400.png)
